genresAdvancedInfo.name: tabla
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A percussion instrument that originated in India, the tabla is often used in classical Indian music as well as in other genres such as fusion and world music. The instrument consists of two drums, the smaller one called the dayan and the larger one called the bayan. The player uses their fingers and palms to create a range of sounds and rhythms, from soft and delicate to fast and intricate. The tabla is known for its versatility and ability to add depth
